fixes.name: Median Sales Price % Increase
fixes.dax_expression: ((MEDIAN('trulia_dataset_cleaned (trulia_dataset_cleanedTBL)'[Price]) - MEDIAN('trulia_dataset_cleaned (trulia_dataset_cleanedTBL)'[Last Sold For])) / MEDIAN('trulia_dataset_cleaned (trulia_dataset_cleanedTBL)'[Last Sold For])) * 100
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted Tableau MEDIAN aggregations to DAX MEDIAN and updated column references to 'table'[Column] format. The expression computes percent increase using MEDIAN of Price and Last Sold For.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation uses aggregate functions (MEDIAN), therefore it must be implemented as a measure.
